mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, EMAIL AS email, ROLE_ID AS roleId, USERNAME AS username, NICKNAME AS nickname, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate FROM USER

SELECT ID AS id, EMAIL AS email, ROLE_ID AS roleId, USERNAME AS username, PASSWORD AS password, NICKNAME AS nickname, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate FROM USER WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, EMAIL) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email})
